Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with Heating, Direct telephone line, Douche / Bathtube, Radio Music, Refrigerator, Safe deposit box, Jacuzzi in Suites. Reception, TV room, Cafeteria, Laundry, dry-cleaning & pressing service. Conference room capacity: up to 200 persons.

Important place or monument close to the hotel: located at Neorion bay just 200m from the beach. situated in an idyllic location - in a private area full of pine trees - and it is build on the edge of a peninsula, just above the sea. Poros is one hour away from Athens and near to many significant archaeological areas like Mykines and Epidavros Conference room capacity: space of 230 sq2 with daylight seating up to 200 persons in theater style
